title: Chappell Roan Sings “Pink Pony Club” and New Song on Saturday Night Live: Watch
description: The breakout star debuted a new country song called “The Giver” on the NBC program
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: The breakout star debuted a new country song called “The Giver” on the NBC program
text: Chappell Roan was the musical guest on Saturday Night Live last night, and she did “Pink Pony Club” and a new country song called “The Giver.” Watch her sing the songs below and on X, and scroll down for her promotional video with host John Mulaney and cast member Ego Nwodim. Scroll down for another promotional video that parodies Bob Dylan.Last night’s episode of Saturday Night Live was the final one before Election Day (November 5), and it featured an appearance from Kamala Harris. The vice president acted alongside Maya Rudolph, who was in character as the Democratic candidate for president. That sketch is below, too.In 2016 and 2020, Dave Chappelle hosted the first post-election episodes of Saturday Night Live, but the NBC program has tapped a new comedian for November 9, 2024: Bill Burr, who’ll be joined by musical guest Mk.gee. The next week will feature host and musical guest Charli XCX.Read the review of Chappell Roan’s first album, The Rise and Fall of a Midwest Princess.
html:
Chappell Roan was the musical guest on Saturday Night Live last night, and she did “Pink Pony Club” and a new country song called “The Giver.” Watch her sing the songs below and on X, and scroll down for her promotional video with host John Mulaney and cast member Ego Nwodim. Scroll down for another promotional video that parodies Bob Dylan.

Last night’s episode of Saturday Night Live was the final one before Election Day (November 5), and it featured an appearance from Kamala Harris. The vice president acted alongside Maya Rudolph, who was in character as the Democratic candidate for president. That sketch is below, too.

In 2016 and 2020, Dave Chappelle hosted the first post-election episodes of Saturday Night Live, but the NBC program has tapped a new comedian for November 9, 2024: Bill Burr, who’ll be joined by musical guest Mk.gee. The next week will feature host and musical guest Charli XCX.

Read the review of Chappell Roan’s first album, The Rise and Fall of a Midwest Princess.
